snippet: Complaints with the state Department of Labor about wage and hour violations were stacked 14,000 high at the end of July.
abstract: Jim Dwyer About New York column on slow rate at which New York State Labor Dept addresses violations of minimum wage law; Urban Justice Center reports that complaints filed with State Labor Department about wage and hour violations were stacked 14,000 high at the end of July, and that in May 2012, 44 percent of the cases had been open for more than a year.
lead_paragraph: Complaints with the state Department of Labor about wage and hour violations were stacked 14,000 high at the end of July.

headline.main: Exhausted Workers Recall Minimal Efforts to Enforce a Minimum Wage Law
headline.print_headline: Exhausted Workers Recall Minimal Efforts to Enforce a Minimum Wage Law
